committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management

official_title: To prohibit certain real property from being named after a sitting Member of Congress.
short_title: Prohibiting Taxpayer-Funded Monuments to Members of Congress Act

summary.text: Prohibiting Taxpayer-Funded Monuments to Members of Congress Act - Prohibits any real property that is under the jurisdiction of the federal government or constructed using federal funds from being named after, or otherwise officially identified by the name of, any Member of Congress.

titles.title: Prohibiting Taxpayer-Funded Monuments to Members of Congress Act
To prohibit certain real property from being named after a sitting Member of Congress.
